Review: Horrible app. Firstly their tracking system is almost non-existent; they don't show you the tracking of the order it just shows "order in process" and then randomly one day the order will get delivered. That's not even the end of it. I ordered 3 products from them in their sale, paid for the 3 products and got only 2. Ive written emails to them multiple times with evidence and their logic was since there is no evidence of a damaged outer packaging, the order has been delivered. So disappointing

Recently recieved my first ever purchase from them and the packaging was so cute!! My products came in a very fancy looking purple box that closes with a magnet!!! It felt like immense thought was put into making my experience worthwhile, and it was. On top of the mindblowing discount, I also received a freebie! I would purchase from Kult again and again. The only problem now is that every single item on my wishlist is OOF. There's a select products available on the website now :( Help!!
